title: 🏋️ TERMINAL GYM 🧘
subtitle: Exercise & Meditation Guide
starting_countdown: ⏰ Starting in 3 seconds... Get into position!
squeeze_instruction: 🏋️  SQUEEZE YOUR GLUTES! Contract those muscles! 🏋️
lift_instruction: 🚀  LIFT YOUR BUTTOCKS! Push up and engage! 🚀
breathe_in_instruction: 🌬️  BREATHE IN SLOWLY... Fill your lungs deeply 🌬️
hold_breath_instruction: ⏸️  HOLD YOUR BREATH... Feel the calm energy ⏸️
breathe_out_instruction: 🍃  BREATHE OUT SLOWLY... Release all tension 🍃
pause_instruction: 🧘  PAUSE AND REST... Feel the peaceful moment 🧘
tip_focus: • Focus on your breath and let go of thoughts
workout_complete: 🎉 Great workout! Your muscles thank you! 🎉
meditation_complete: 🧘 Peaceful session! Your mind thanks you! ✨
language_help: Use --lang=en for English or --lang=zh for Chinese
